text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the Board of Public Works.
"Capital appreciation bond" means a State bond that accrues interest payable only on the date of maturity.
"Enabling act" means a law that authorizes the creation of a general obligation debt of the State and the sale of State bonds to evidence that debt.
"State bond" means a general obligation bond of the State.
"State debt" means the general obligation debt of the State.
